ui/tutorials/fishing/steps/0/text:
Look out for fish shadows when
exploring areas with water.
ui/tutorials/fishing/steps/1/text:
Use your fishing rod to cast your
line near a fish, ideally in
their line of sight.
ui/tutorials/fishing/steps/2/text:
Fish will nibble and bite the line.
Quickly pull them in when they bite!
ui/tutorials/fishing/steps/3/text:
Fish schools will appear sometimes,
allowing you to easily catch
multiple fish in a row.
ui/tutorials/fishing/steps/4/text:
Dive spots can also be seen in water
occasionally. Swim over to them and
then dive to see what's hidden!
